description: A simple bracelet of string and wooden beads.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  Also doubles as a set of prayer beads, if you're so inclined.

name.str_pl: pairs of beaded earrings

description: A simple pair of earrings made of string and wooden beads.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A simple necklace made of string and wooden beads.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  Also doubles as a set of prayer beads, if you're so inclined.
A homemade bracelet crafted from colorful knickknacks.  It's not very expensive, but it's the effort that makes it special.
A medal awarded for achieving third place in some event.  It might be worth something if it was made of bronze; this one is made from iron.
Fake teeth inlaid with diamonds, worn over the teeth.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.  For that high-class gangsta rap look.
Fake teeth inlaid with garnets, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with amethysts, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with aquamarines, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with emeralds, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with alexandrites, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with rubys, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with peridots, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with sapphires, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with tourmaline, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
Fake teeth inlaid with citrines, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
A barrette with lots of ornaments.
Fake teeth inlaid with blue topaz, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.
A gold ring with a sparkling diamond mounted on top of it.  Back in the old days this could be worth a fortune.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: diver's watches

description: A waterproof, self-winding watch on a stainless steel watchband.  Tells the time and current temperature.  Activate to check the digital thermometer.
A staple accessory for gentlemen.  Keeps your shirt collar in place and provides a more aesthetically pleasing arc to your necktie.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
An old-fashioned, copper bracelet.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of copper earrings

description: A pair of copper earrings.  It's pretty heavy.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A hairpin made from copper.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A circular, copper locket.  It's been tarnished with use, and has gained some dull green spots.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A simple chain of copper, with a clasp in the middle to create a necklace.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A plain, copper ring.  Not very shiny, and not very popular.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of cufflinks

description: An unmarked, pair of silver cufflinks.  Cufflinks are used to secure the cuffs of dress shirts - a must-have for men in formal wear.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of intricate cufflinks

description: An expensive pair of silver cufflinks, stylized with detailed overlays of gold gears and fractal patterns.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A pair of cufflinks with inset garnets.

A pair of cufflinks with inset pearls.
Those round things people plug into their earlobes as earrings, also called "ear plug" or "ear spool."  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A fancy golden bracelet.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
Fake golden teeth, worn over the teeth.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.

name.str_pl: pairs of gold earrings

description: A pair of shiny gold earrings.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A gold hairpin, designed by the rich, for the rich.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A heart-shaped, gold locket with a frame inside to store photographs or small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A medal awarded for achieving first place in some event.  Before everything fell apart, this could be a source of pride for its owner.  Now it's just another shiny bauble.
A shiny, unadorned gold necklace.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A flashy gold ring.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: gold watches

description: A gold-plated steel self-winding wristwatch, suitable for a retirement present.  Tells the time and looks good.
A fancy silver tie clip, a great match for your skinny tie.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: silver watches

description: An elegant silver watch, crafted from silver-plated stainless steel.  It's much cheaper than other metal watches, and more classy than an ordinary wristwatch.
A nice silver bracelet.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: pairs of silver earrings

description: A pair of beautiful silver earrings.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.

name.str_pl: fancy watches

//: That's about the midpoint for a rolex.
description: A rather large and expensively made wristwatch.  Tells the time in elegantly wrought gold with silver detailing.  It's really the only timepiece suitable for someone of your exquisitely discerning tastes.
A small relic from a forgotten saint.  As extraordinary as the world has become it may have some power yet.
A necklace made of fine gold chain bearing the symbol of a forgotten faith.
A simple necklace representing a religious faith.

name.str_pl: jade brooches

description: A hand-crafted jade brooch of Oriental origin.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A collar made from round and lustrous pearls, its former owner must be a wealthy individual.

name.str_pl: platinum watches

description: Flex on those gold-watch wearers with the rare, expensive and superior platinum watch.  This one is made from solid platinum.
//: far more expensive than gold watches, around $100,000 for most platinum watches

description: A flawless platinum bracelet.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
Fake platinum-and-silver teeth.  They may be cheaper than fake gold teeth, but they're much more rare.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.

name.str_pl: pairs of platinum earrings

description: A pair of plain platinum earrings - if gold is getting boring, just use another rare metal.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
The ultimate in esoteric, metal hair accessories, this hairpin is made from pure platinum.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A small, platinum locket for storing photographs or other small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A platinum necklace, with a small, empty heart frame hanging from a chain.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A platinum ring, engraved with all manner of swirls and spirals.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
This ring is an intricate gold band, with a small cluster of diamonds set in the center.  Before the world broke down, this ring would've cost a small fortune.
Also known as a promise ring, this ring is worn as a sign of chastity.  This one bears the inscription, "Love is patient."
A gold and silver ring with a wide stamp attached to the band.  A long time ago, the stamp was legible, but now the pattern is too worn to discern its former use.
A flawless ring, ensnaring a diamond with twists of pure gold.  It's a constant reminder that the wearer is married.
A nice silver necklace.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A shiny, silver hairpin with a tiny bee engraved onto it.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A small, silver locket with a frame inside to store photographs or small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A medal awarded for achieving second place in some event.  Before everything fell apart, this could be a source of pride for its owner.  Now it's just another shiny bauble.
A simple, silver ring.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.
A black leather 'collar' with a bell dangling from the front.  Don't worry, the bell is silent.

name.str_pl: wrist watches

description: A simple wristwatch on a plastic band.  Tells the time and has an alarm clock feature.

//: These seem to be sold via subscription; makes a certain amount of sense, but low-bid seems a Bad Idea.
description: A plastic badge with an embedded filmstrip.  The filmstrip changes color as it is exposed to radiation.  Wear on your lapel so you can notice if it changes.
This is a template for police/medical badges.  If found in a game, it is a bug.
//: should cover TORSO but give no encumbrance penalties

description: A chromed silver shield identifies the wearer as an authority even the cop-killers couldn't kill.
A tarnished silver star gives an air of authority to the wearer.
A tarnished golden shield gives an air of authority to the wearer.
A bright silver star strikes fear into the eyes of ne'er-do-wells.
A matte-finish silver shield identifies the wearer as an authority who goes in when the bots just aren't enough.
A plastic name tag marking the wearer as a real doctor of the medical kind.
A star shaped badge.  On it, you can read "Foodkid" in bold letters.  This is Foodperson's trusty sidekick's badge.

name.str_pl: pairs of fuzzy cat ears

description: A fuzzy pair of brownish cat ears on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.

name.str: pair of faux fur cat ears
name.str_pl: pairs of faux fur cat ears

description: A fuzzy pair of garishly colored cat ears on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A fuzzy tawny tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.
A fuzzy garishly colored tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.
A decorative 'collar' made out of fur, complete with a little bell hanging from the front.  Don't worry, it's silent.
A decorative 'collar' made out of faux fur.  Complete with a little bell hanging from the front.  Don't worry, it's silent.

name.str_pl: pairs of leather cat ears

description: A shiny pair of black cat ears on a headband.  It does nothing, but there's no reason not to look good even if no one's looking.
A glossy black leather tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.
